events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund because I want to return it and get my money back.
The issue has been classified as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding returning the jacket.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah W. who specializes in handling refund cases.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return the jacket and request a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return to proceed with the refund process?
Sure, the order number is 5489321. The jacket is too small despite the size chart, so I want to return it and get a refund.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate the return process immediately. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for your help. I will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
Your return has been authorized. Please use the prepaid label included in your package to send the jacket back for a full refund.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and ask if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I got the label and already sent the jacket back yesterday. I appreciate your quick help resolving this.
We have processed your refund as the return package was received. The amount should reflect in your account shortly.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your refund experience with us.
I completed the survey and Iâ€™m very satisfied with the efficient and friendly service I received. Thank you!
We are closing your case now. Thank you for contacting support, and we hope to assist you again in the future.
